DOCNAME: CASE OF SKIDAN AND ZINKOVSKYY v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .

CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of criminal proceedings and of the lack of any effective remedy in domestic law . The applicant in application no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL also raised another complaint under LAW concerning the conditions of his detention .
